item.title: Ends soon: Stanley’s 96-ounce IceFlow Jug is on sale for Prime Day
item.description: If staying hydrated is your summer sport,Amazon Prime Day 2025just delivered a winning deal. In the final hours of the sale, you can save 25% on the96-ounce Stanley IceFlow Flip Straw Jug with Handle—but only through the end ofFriday, July 11.

item.title: We hand-picked last-chance Prime Day deals to shop before tonight
item.description: What day is it? Is it still July? After three product-packed days, we've reached the final countdown:Amazon Prime Day 2025endstonight, July 11. TheUSA TODAY Shopping teamhas been tracking all the most popular price cuts, the deepest discounts and yes, some of the most unexpected finds from the big sale.

item.title: The craziest Prime Day Apple deals end tonight. Here's what to shop
item.description: Still thinking about pulling the trigger on a new pair of Apple AirPods? I'm here to tell you that you should not wait much longer. The2025 Amazon Prime Day sale endstonight, July 11and the best deals are sure to disappear.

item.title: Looking back at Sarasota, Manatee's all-time state…
item.description: Since the Florida High School Athletic Association started holding baseball state championships in 1922, Sarasota/Manatee counties have racked up 25 titles, the first dating back to 1925.
